column1: The scientists statement (and it's signatories) expressing concern over the surveillance nature of the proposed NHSX contact tracing app - essential reading, really. #COVID19 #Covid_19 #coronavirus

Not sure anyone can guess at what the current government has in mind for dealing with #COVID19 or even the #NHS, #Police, the #justice system, #flooding, #poverty, #hunger or an explanation for their seeming determination to bring about economic collapse! #FoodbankFriday
Did you know there is a UK #NHS111 App for #coronavirus #COVID19 #Covid_19 ??  Here's the link:https://twitter.com/YorksAmbulance/status/1234804045539311617 …

Even if you don't believe in prayer, please stop a moment and think of everyone currently in lockdown in N #Italy ... the stresses on their sophisticated #healthcare system must serve as a warning for us in the #UK - this could be the calm before the #COVID19 storm #coronavirus

"the failure of the Conservative government to maintain the NHS properly is now causing it to mismanage a pandemic. One terrible mistake has forced them to another fatal error." #COVID19 #Covid_19 #coronavirus https://twitter.com/WillBlackWriter/status/1240786797455646721 …
